channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [WFLY-1507] Investigate failure in StatefulWithXPCFailoverTestCase
item.description:
Numerous exceptions are reported and the tests fails intermittently but often in StatefulWithXPCFailoverTestCase.

Entire logs attached.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
baranowb <bbaranow@redhat.com> made a comment on bug 963610

This has been fixed in 8A3

https://issues.jboss.org/browse/WFLY-1507

baranowb <bbaranow@redhat.com> made a comment on bug 963610

I face this on 6.1.x-proposed.

Jitka Kudrnacova <jkudrnac@redhat.com> made a comment on bug 963610

Update from EAP 6.1.1.ER7 testing:

The test org.jboss.as.test.clustering.cluster.ejb3.xpc.StatefulWithXPCFailoverTestCase(SYNC-tcp).testSecondLevelCache
fails with the following:

expected:<200> but was:<500>

https://jenkins.mw.lab.eng.bos.redhat.com/hudson/job/eap-6x-jgroups-tcpgossip-rhel-matrix/61/jdk=java16_default,label=RHEL5_x86/testReport/junit/org.jboss.as.test.clustering.cluster.ejb3.xpc/StatefulWithXPCFailoverTestCase(SYNC-tcp)/testSecondLevelCache/

Jaikiran Pai <jpai@redhat.com> made a comment on bug 963610

Please save/attach the server side logs from relevant nodes, so that whoever investigates this failure might find it a bit easier to understand the issue.

Paul Ferraro <paul.ferraro@redhat.com> made a comment on bug 963610

We will plan to port the upstream fix for this test for 6.2.

Richard Janík <rjanik@redhat.com> made a comment on bug 963610

Update: present in 6.2.0.ER1 as well.

Paul Ferraro <paul.ferraro@redhat.com> made a comment on bug 963610

The addition of the GlobalComponentRegistryService should improve the reliability of this test. Please retest against EAP 6.2.0.ER2.
Paul Gier <pgier@redhat.com> changed the Status of bug 963610 from NEW to MODIFIED
Paul Gier <pgier@redhat.com> changed the Status of bug 963610 from MODIFIED to ON_QA

Richard Janík <rjanik@redhat.com> made a comment on bug 963610

I haven't seen testBasicXPC fail, but there is a fail in testSecondLevelCache. I'm putting it here, since the stacktraces are largely the same and it is also possible that testBasicXPC will show itself in time. I have also changed the name of the bug to better reflect this.

Seen here: https://jenkins.mw.lab.eng.bos.redhat.com/hudson/job/eap-6x-jgroups-tcpgossip-rhel-matrix/65/jdk=ibm16,label=RHEL6_x86/testReport/org.jboss.as.test.clustering.cluster.ejb3.xpc/StatefulWithXPCFailoverTestCase%28ASYNC-tcp%29/testSecondLevelCache/

Error Message

expected:<200> but was:<500>

Stacktrace
